ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 93
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/10/2000 2:41:44 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Protection Deity: Carnelian, BoC, water, sketch Firing Sheet Resistance Deity: Wolfs Eye
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/10/2000 2:41:44 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
EQ_Potters@egroups.com writes:

> OK so what is the recipe for the protection and resistance dieties.

Protection Deity:
Carnelian, BoC, water, sketch
Firing Sheet

Resistance Deity:
Wolfs Eye Agate, SBoC, water, sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet

Credit to:
Berg Tunarbos's research on the pre-wiped SonyEQ Coalition of Tradesfolks
message board.

> I charged 2p each with price break on quantity.

From what I've read that is the price that the NPC Vendor charge.
One of the rouge observations at The Safehouse, is that Pottery Mastery
can be obtained for ~25p. It doesn't suprise me that there are few orders,
but location is everything. Enchanters do Tip well, but until there is other
uses for Thicken Mana - don't expect a rush to make stacks.

Cleric Taven
